“It’s that great pride in club, province and nation that we’re here to celebrate tonight.” - Warren Deutrom

"We're seeing more female leaders in Irish cricket – as President, on our Board, in Executive positions in Cricket Ireland and the Unions. We need more women and girls in our sport, watching our sport and running our sport. It’s a challenge we have to rise to." - Warren Deutrom
"The cricket world is growing up in its recognition of women’s cricket, and it’s a responsibility we share." - Warren Deutrom

"My immediate hope is that talk of ‘the senior squad’ or ‘the World Cup’ is not automatically assumed to be about men. One my highlights this year was our women qualifying for the World T20 - another demonstration of the huge talent among our female cricketers." - Warren Deutrom

"Cricket Ireland’s commitment to funding development is unwavering and the grass-roots of our game remains a top priority for the organisation - there will be no reduction of funding for development / participation activities now and in the foreseeable future." - Warren Deutrom

“The Provincial Unions need to become the fulcrum on which we all balance, and our job is to support them so that they, in turn, both support our clubs, and provide our pipeline of future internationals." - Warren Deutrom
"The revival of the Inter-Pros has done nothing less than revolutionise our thinking on the role of the Provincial Unions in Irish cricket." - Warren Deutrom
“That we are being held to a higher standard simply by being a Full Member is no surprise. With growth, comes growing pains, and with change can come uncertainty." - Warren Deutrom

"After the transformational year that was 2017, how do we now feel 12 months down the road? Do we still feel that same sense of elation? Have we actually delivered a year of success or simply fulfilled what would be expected of a Full Member nation?" - Warren Deutrom

"We should proudly reflect on a year of achievement – our inaugural men’s Test match, our senior women qualifying for the World T20, opening our high performance centre, our first female President, securing 100+ men’s international fixtures over next 4 years." - Warren Deutrom https://t.co/hViK8aHJ8e

“Cricket...a sport that can break down social and cultural barriers.” - Hasan Mutlu

#CIAwards2018 #BackingGreen https://t.co/CeYb4Dr9rS
